forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 5pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 63. South wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm. Partly cloudy. Low around 56, with temperatures rising to around 58 overnight. Southwest wind 9 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.shortForecast: Partly Sunny then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers between 2pm and 5pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny. High near 71, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 12 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm, then rain. Cloudy, with a low around 46. East wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely. Cloudy, with a high near 38. East wind 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely before 8pm, then rain and a chance of thunderstorms between 8pm and 4am, then freezing rain and rain and a slight chance of thunderstorms. Cloudy. Low around 30, with temperatures rising to around 33 overnight. East wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Freezing rain before 1pm, then a chance of sleet between 1pm and 2pm, then a chance of freezing rain. Cloudy. High near 32, with temperatures falling to around 30 in the afternoon. Northeast wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New ice accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Freezing rain. Cloudy, with a low around 29. East wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New ice accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain. Cloudy. High near 42, with temperatures falling to around 40 in the afternoon. Southeast wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 8pm, then rain and a chance of thunderstorms. Cloudy. Low around 31, with temperatures rising to around 35 overnight. East wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and a slight chance of thunderstorms before 8am, then freezing rain and rain. Cloudy. High near 34, with temperatures falling to around 31 in the afternoon. East wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.name: Saturday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Freezing rain. Cloudy, with a low around 28. East wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New ice accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs with over a foot of snow since Thursday. Upper loops powertilled and tracked again Monday AM. Mid-winter type conditions should continue through the weekend.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 5 lifts, Rope Tow and Space Worm.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were groomed on Tuesday morning. Expect firm snow in the morning that will transition to softer snow late in the day.
nubsNob.comments: The wet snow from yesterday has firmed up overnight. Expect hard snow this morning that will soften around noon. The best skiing this morning is back on Pintail Peak as that was groomed last. The wind is up from the East today. Coverage on all of our snowmaking runs continues to be very good. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with an espresso bar. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 4:30 PM. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
